  • Reference

    Get locations and location data Map layout and themes with ggplot2 utility functions

    Function reference

    Utility functions for downloading, reading, and writing spatial data

    get_location()
    Get location of specified type
    get_location_data()
    Get data for a location
    get_esri_data()
    Get data from an ArcGIS FeatureServer or MapServer for a location
    get_osm_data()
    Get Open Street Map features for a location
    read_sf_path() read_sf_url() read_sf_package()
    Read spatial data in a bounding box to a simple feature object
    write_sf_ext() write_sf_cache()
    Write or cache a simple feature object to a file

    Utility functions for simple feature objects

    st_bbox_adj()
    Get bounding box buffered and adjusted to match aspect ratio
    st_bbox_asp()
    Get bounding box adjusted to match aspect ratio
    st_bearing()
    Get bearing of a simple feature object with LINESTRING geometry
    st_buffer_ext()
    Buffer a simple feature or bounding box object
    st_inscribed_square()
    Create an inscribed square in a simple feature object
    st_scale_rotate()
    Scale or rotate a simple feature object
    st_transform_ext()
    Transform or convert coordinates of a simple feature object
    sf_bbox_asp() sf_bbox_dist() sf_bbox_xdist() sf_bbox_ydist() sf_bbox_diagdist() sf_bbox_transform() sf_bbox_to_sf() sf_bbox_to_wkt() sf_bbox_to_lonlat_query()
    Measure, transform, and convert bounding boxes
    sf_to_df() df_to_sf()
    Convert simple feature object to data frame with coordinates or data frame to simple feature

    Layers and geoms for mapping with ggplot2

    layer_location_data()
    Layer location data into a ggplot2 map
    layer_mask()
    Create a mask layer based on a simple feature object
    layer_neatline()
    Set map limits to sf or bbox object with optional adjustments and panel border
    layer_show_location()
    Layer a location border into a ggplot2 map
    geom_sf_icon()
    Draw SVG icons for a simple feature object

    Utility functions for ggplot2 themes and file export

    ggsave_ext()
    Save a ggplot and update file EXIF metadata
    get_asp()
    Get aspect ratio from string or based on specific paper and margins
    get_paper()
    Get standard paper and image sizes
    get_margin()
    Get margins for a ggplot2 plot or map based on style or distance
    theme_text() theme_margin() theme_legend()
    Modify the text, margins, or legend for a ggplot theme
    make_filename()
    Make file name and path with optional label, prefix, or postfix

    Reference data used by functions

    map_icons
    Map icons
    paper_sizes
    Standard paper and image sizes
    valid_dist_units
    Valid distance units

    On this page
